listItemOptions.prefixDescription: Add fields based on a shared naming prefix.
listItemOptions.manualDescription: Choose time series fields manually from your list of fields.

noFieldsFound: No fields were found with the specified prefix.
noTimeSeriesFieldsDescription: Add fields that correspond to different time spans to get started.
noTimeSeriesFieldsDescriptionLong: Add fields that correspond to different time spans to get started. Two or more of your fields should represent the same data attributes at different points in time for each feature.
timeSeriesDoc: For guidance on time series visualizations, visit the {helpDoc}.
